definition: my (you etc) old father/polite appellation for an elderly male

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: For the first time that afternoon the Don behaved coolly.
sentences.chinese: 这是老爷子整个下午第一次表现的冷酷。

sentences.english: The master sub- eyebrows a wrinkly, some impatient Nu minds.
sentences.chinese: 老爷子眉头一皱，有些不耐烦的怒意。

sentences.english: The old man has the habit of drinking a little white wine before meals.
sentences.chinese: 老爷子就喜欢饭前喝一口白干儿。

sentences.english: Emissaries were sent to bring the Don back into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他秘密派人把老爷子请到会议室里面。

sentences.english: The old man tapped the steering wheel once with his foreFingers.
sentences.chinese: 那位老爷子用食指轻轻拍着方向盘。

sentences.english: He did it rarely but now he could not resist jesting with the Don.
sentences.chinese: 他很少这样但是现在他无法抗拒和老爷子打趣的冲动。

sentences.english: Geopolitics is definitely in play. Thank you professor for another powerful insight!
sentences.chinese: 地缘政治的确有关，多些乔老爷子你的牛比见解。

sentences.english: That was the mark of the Don's humanity.
sentences.chinese: 那是老爷子谦逊的一个标志。

sentences.english: The Don had pondered the question until the next day.
sentences.chinese: 老爷子一直到第二天下午都还在想这件事情。
老爷子不耐烦地说，“为什么？

sentences.english: Feng Mian Street on the day attracted foreign goods could not comment.
sentences.chinese: 冯老爷子对天街招来洋品牌看不顺眼。

definition: (coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man
polite term for old woman or man
see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
